heading: HB07816
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DIAGNOSTIC LABORATORY TO IDENTIFY THE DISEASES AFFECTING LOCAL HOGS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07816
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DIAGNOSTIC LABORATORY TO IDENTIFY THE DISEASES AFFECTING LOCAL HOGS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Creates a Diagnostic Laboratory to study and identity the disease strains of hogs and recommend vaccines to prevent them.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-07-30
